attributes.action: privatise the BBC to ensure it becomes more neutral and financially responsible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC was once a British institution, producing high-quality output as a public service broadcsater.

However, it has now become institutionally biased and is therefore not representative of those licence fee payers who fund it.

It also shows a complete disregard for money, spending as if money 'grows on trees'.

Unless the BBC can produce unbiased output, taxpayers should not be forced to fund the extravagances of the BBC.

The BBC must survive by means of market forces to ensure it becomes more neutral and show that it can be financially responsible; this means privatising the BBC.
